column1: Little Goat Diner////I ordered the 'This Little Piggy Went to China" which had a sesame cheddar biscuit with sunny side up eggs
column3: chili garlic chive sauce and blackberries. The "szechuan" should've given it away for me. The flavor is very similar to spicy wontons. Also had the tempura mashed potatoes
column4: which was interesting and not bad.
